Bluetooth was not enabled. Leaving Bluetooth Chat.

On First installation, press the "start service" button below to begin monitoring (this will start automatically on-boot in the future). 

A pop-up message will request permission to screen capture - grant permission and check "do not show again." The "start service" button can be used at any time if it has stopped due to errors or other reasons. 

Be sure to enable the permissions for "Record Audio" and "Usage Access" requested during install. Make sure this device is paired with the administrator phone to allow for future data transfer.
It is best to obtain concurrence from the monitored user. Alternatively, you will need to enforce bluetooth pairing through disbling access to settings
Currently, Android does not allow any app to prevent the user from uninstalling it through safe mode. Scoped will alert you if it appears the companion app has not run in the last 24 hours.
Third party apps with root access may provide stricter installation control on the monitored phone. Alternatively, we recommend revoking device access unless the monitored user agrees to installation
Select the monitored device under \"target devices\" to view and retrieve monitored screenshots/videos. Press \"retrieve data\" to download files. Press the Calendar icon to adjust download settings
